content: then make 3 double_crochet in the next ch2 space and repeat along the row to the last chain 2 space in the last chain 2 space which is the one before the join you will make 2 double_crochet not 3 and you will slip_stitch to the first double_crochet of the round row 5 repeat row 3 row 6 repeat row 4 continue in the same manner repeating row 3 and 4 till you have a total of 16 row or the height you require your hat to fit snuggly on your head my final hat height was 7 inches if you want a more slouchy beanie then continue your row until you have the size you want making sure you end on a row 4 ©tinyanaesthetist 2018 zahra fazel all rights reserved please do not distribute or modify the pattern however you are free to make as many hats as you please from the pattern provided you credit me i would love to see your beanie so please tag me #akilspompombeanie now to finish what we need to do now is close the hole at the top to finish the beanie off in the main color now for the closure you can now fasten_off and secure the contrast yarn and weave your end away row 1 chain 3 and double_crochet in the first st and 2dctog decrease in the next 2 repeat this all the way round the hat slip_stitch to the first double_crochet of the round row 2 chain 3 and 2dctog all the way round essentially decreasing in every stitch slip_stitch to the first double_crochet of the round now fasten_off and leave a long end take a darning needle and thread your end through now pass your darning needle through the front loop of each stitch all the way round pull tight and voila your beanie has closed fasten everything firmly and pop a pom pom on a special special thank you to all my testers… hilde emma ruth alice rizwana jane vanessa and kerry ©tinyanaesthetist 2018 zahra fazel all
